item.description:
A member suggested this restaurant which we will go to on 07/21/10 7:00pm:

Lotus Grillâ€™s dishes are made from the best ingredients, freshest meats, and vegetables. We have a delicious selection of unforgettable Vietnamese dishes: rice vermicelli, popular pho (rice noodle soups), chicken with lemon grass, fish with ginger sauce, shrimp with tamarind sauce, and so much more! Lotus Grill guarantees satisfaction for more any appetite. Whether you are a meat, vegetarian or exotic food lover, we have many dishes to choose from and offer a casual, friendly atmosphere that you and your friends are sure to enjoy. finest ingredients.
* Come taste the difference at Lotus Grill Their website is http://www.lotusgrill...

Some Ethnic Dining "Rules":

1) If you RSVP "YES" you are expected to SHOW UP!!! Be polite and make sure you change your RSVP by 1:00pm the day before if need be. If you have to cancel at the last minute call the restaurant to let them know.

2) Please bring cash, it is so much quicker and easier. Remember, no one leaves until the bill is paid - this is respect for the event's host and the other diners.

3) I will collect $1.00 from each participant for Meetup fees.

- Betsy

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: LOTUS GRILL 07/21/10 7:00PM
